How many people are affected by mucolipidosis III gamma ?,"Mucolipidosis III gamma is a rare disorder, although its exact prevalence is unknown. It is estimated to occur in about 1 in 100,000 to 400,000 individuals worldwide.",GHR,mucolipidosis III gam
